Detailed Description

The Dotifiable class defines interfaces to dump a dot graph representation of the object.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual RFO::Dotifiable::~Dotifiable (  )  [virtual]

Virtual destructor

Member Function Documentation

virtual void RFO::Dotifiable::dump ( ODotStream &  o  )  const [pure virtual]

Dump a representation the object state into the dot stream. Dot stream may be configured by properties (see DotStream class) in order to choose a representation of basic object.

Implemented in RFO::Thread, DFG::Thread, and Sched::Thread.
